body_html:
There is an obvious problem due to downcasting, yes. I was concerned about whether this could be trainable, and how costly training would be.

MAGMA does not have support for float16 qr factorization, and so does LAPACK I think.
body_text:
There is an obvious problem due to downcasting, yes. I was concerned about whether this could be trainable, and how costly training would be.
MAGMA does not have support for float16 qr factorization, and so does LAPACK I think.
body:
There is an obvious problem due to downcasting, yes. I was concerned about whether this could be trainable, and how costly training would be.

MAGMA does not have support for `float16` qr factorization, and so does LAPACK I think.
